page.title: 11DERBY DAY POEMS
page.content:
"Derby Day is an exciting day, The smells of beefburgers and hotdogs That waft in the air all day long. The smell of smoke and fumes From transport and cigarettes, The bitter smell of beer Wafting out of beer tents."
{"You see multi-coloured balloons { floating on {Strings and in the air."
"There's a man inspecting the race- course And crowds of people too. And the tic-tac men Doing what they do."
{"People have come to see the races, {Some have come from far away. {Thousands of cars and coaches, {All to see Derby Day."
